item.title: EventBridge
item.description: About EventB­ridge is a serverless event bus that makes it easy to connect applic­ations together using data from apps, integrated SaaS apps, & AWS services. Documentation User Guide EventB­ridge is a low-cost alternative to building a new backend infrastructure for every new app. With Serverless EventB­ridge, you can connect your existing apps with a few lines of code. You don’t have to build a new backend for every new app you want to connect to. You can use existing infrastructure as a provider of event data, and connect your apps using Serverless EventB­ridge.
